extension.searchTitle: To restrict any State or local jurisdiction from imposing a new discriminatory tax on cell phone services, providers, or property.; Wireless Tax Fairness Act of 2013;H.R. 2309 (IH)

titleInfo.title: To restrict any State or local jurisdiction from imposing a new discriminatory tax on cell phone services, providers, or property.
